channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: MasterClass CEO admits it’s ‘really tough’ for Gen Z grads—he reveals how they can get hiring managers to respond to cold emails
item.description: AI may be gutting entry-level opportunities, but MasterClass CEO David Rogier argues it’s also Gen Z’s biggest shot to stand out—if they know how to u...

item.title: Want to Perform at Your Physical Best? Science Says First Think About Mental Effort (and Energy)
item.description: Mental fatigue affects your focus, decision-making, and cognitive skills. But it can also affect how well you perform physically.

item.title: TikTok’s $14 billion price tag in Trump deal stuns investors
item.description: The rough estimate, cited by Vice President JD Vance on Thursday, is well below previous projections that scaled closer to $40 billion.

item.title: At a Yale Gathering, Top CEOs Shared Their Real Thoughts on Trump’s Policies
item.description: The administration gets lavish praise from business leaders in public. Their private opinions could surprise you.

item.title: The No. 1 Thing We Can Learn About Healthy Aging From Hunter-Gatherers, Says This Anthropologist
item.description: Forget ‘paleo’ diets or exercise routines, the most important thing our ancestors can teach us about healthy aging is totally different.

item.title: The Fed’s once oh-so-certain cuts for the rest of 2025 are already fading into oblivion
item.description: U.S. economic data keeps coming back stronger than expected, and frankly it's raining on the parade for markets.

item.title: Here’s how Bryson DeChambeau, golf’s mad scientist, is using AI as a swing coach
item.description: Artificial intelligence is infiltrating every corner of professional sports, from scouting and injury prevention to scheduling. Now, it looks like gol...

item.title: How Instagram’s ‘Deliberate Design Choices’ Make It Unsafe for Teens Despite Meta Promises, Report Says
item.description: The findings come from a new report by a whistleblower and four nonprofit groups.

item.title: AI passed the hardest CFA test in minutes

item.title: Trump made EVs temporarily cheaper than gas cars—and it boosted sales
item.description: EV sales just hit a new record in the U.S.: This month, they’re on track to make up 12.2% of new car sales, according to J.D. Power and Associates. Me...

item.title: Amazon Just Learned a $2.5 Billion Lesson About How Not to Treat Customers
When your VC is your CEO
item.description: Arjun Sethi become co-CEO of crypto currency exchange Kraken last fall. He's also the Chairman of Tribe Capital, one of the company's backers.

item.title: Behind the inventive production design of ‘The Amazing Adventures of Kavalier and Clay’

item.title: Touchscreens in cars are finally on their way out. Good riddance

item.title: Under the radar, CEOs have growing concerns about U.S. commitment to free speech, science, and rule of law
